description: This script performs performance testing of OpenSSL components by executing various stress tests and measuring performance metrics using the 'perf' tool. It sets environment-specific parameters, runs multiple stress test functions, logs performance data, and uploads logs to a server.

methods.name: log
methods.description: Logs messages with timestamps to the log file.

methods.name: stress_bio_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests related to bio functions.

methods.name: stress_ui_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests related to UI.

methods.name: stress_ec_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests related to elliptic curve functions.

methods.name: stress_engine_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests related to engine functions.

methods.name: stress_bn_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests related to big number functions.

methods.name: stress_rsa_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests related to RSA.

methods.name: stress_des_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests related to DES and modes.

methods.name: stress_cipher_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests for cipher list, name, and byte functions.

methods.name: stress_err_function
methods.description: Runs error handling and fatal error performance tests.

methods.name: stress_x509_function
methods.description: Performs various X.509 certificate related performance tests.

methods.name: stress_dsa_function
methods.description: Performs DSA and ECDSA related performance tests.

methods.name: stress_tls_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests for TLS and DTLS protocols.

methods.name: stress_dh_function
methods.description: Runs performance tests related to Diffie-Hellman.

methods.name: stress_asn1_function
methods.description: Runs ASN.1 encoding, decoding, and internal structure tests.
